source.sqlReaderQuery:
select SourcePath,SourceFolder,SourceFileType,SQLTargetDatabase,SQLTargetUser,SQLTargetPassword,SQLTargetTable,ExcludeFiles,ColstoCopy from [cglhdatabase].[dbo].[CGConfiguration] 
where GroupName='CopyFiles_BLOBtoSQL' and ActiveFlag='y'
select ParamName,ParamChar from [dbo].[Parameters] where ParamName in('copy_blobtoblob_sourcepath','copy_blobtoblob_targetpath','copy_blobtoblob_sourcefile') order by ParamId asc
